Backspace.description: Move one character to the left

Delete or Ctrl + h.description: Delete one character to the right

Ctrl + a.description: Move to the beginning of the line

Ctrl + e.description: Move to the end of the line

Ctrl + l.description: Clear the screen and display only the current line

Ctrl + k.description: Delete the character under the cursor

Ctrl + d.description: Delete the character before the cursor

Ctrl + f.description: Delete the character after the cursor
